SEARCH
Package src.service

Class ApplicantProjectViewService

java.lang.Object
src.service.ApplicantProjectViewService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicantProjectViewService
public class ApplicantProjectViewService extends Object implements IApplicantProjectViewService
Helps applicants view and filter available housing projects. Shows project details, supports filtering by district, neighborhood, and flat type.
